Generation II.Gold: If it finds honey, its crescent mark glows. It always licks its paws because they are soaked with honey.
Generation II.Silver: Before food becomes scarce in wintertime, its habit is to hoard food in many hidden locations.
Generation II.Crystal: It always licks honey. Its palm tastes sweet because of all the honey it has absorbed.
Generation II.Stadium 2: If it finds honey, its crescent mark glows. It always licks its paws because they are soaked with honey. Generation IX.Violet: Its paws are soaked in oodles of honey. When nervous, Teddiursa will lick its paws and soon have a smile back on its face.
